alert.note: Alert for Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 12:00PM CST until March 04 at 2:20PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian, Greene, Lawrence, Stone and Webster. * WHEN...Until 800 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1200 PM CST, The Department of Transportation reported flooding from previous heavy rain in the warned area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Woods Fork at Woods Fork Road, Swan Creek at Swan Cave Road, Green Valley Creek at Holder RD, James River at Bell Ford Road, Bull Creek at Center Road, Finley River at Johns Ford Road and Wilson`s Creek at Old Limey Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Republic, Monett, Aurora, Marshfield, Battlefield, Mount Vernon, Highlandville, Rogersville, Marionville, Clever, Seymour, Sparta, Crane, Pierce City, Billings, Fordland, Miller, Verona, Niangua, Diggins, Fremont Hills, Duncan, Brookline, Stotts City, Hurley, Spokane, Halltown, Freistatt, Hoberg, Chesapeake, Galloway, Boaz, Selmore, Turners, Linden, Christian Center and Ponce de Leon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
